name: BLASTOFF!
description:
A very simple game made in the Godot Engine for The Linux Game Jam 2017!

Escape the onslaught of a heavy missile barrage by blasting off towards space with your jetpack!

Based on a simple idea for a mobile game and somewhat visually inspired by Jetpac(1983) by Ultimate Play The Game/Rare.

Controls:
Space to restart after death.
Left and right arrow keys to control direction.

Source/workfiles/Godot project filestructure available at:
https://github.com/Dregel/blastoff
